Add patients to a subset

Source: R/fct_data_management.R
add_patients_to_subset.Rd

Add patients to a subset, only if not already in the subset

add_patients_to_subset(
  output,
  r = shiny::reactiveValues(),
  patients = tibble::tibble(),
  subset_id = integer(),
  success_notification = TRUE,
  language = "EN"
)

Arguments

output

Output variable from Shiny, used to render messages on the message bar
r

The r reactive variable, used to communicate between modules in the ShinyApp (reactiveValues object)
patients

data variable containing patients (data.frame / tibble)
subset_id

ID of subset (integer)
success_notification

Should a message bar be displayed if insertion of patient(s) is a success ? Default to TRUE
language

language used for error / warning messages (character, default = "EN")

Details

...

Examples

if (FALSE) {
patients <- tibble::tribble(~patient_id, 123L, 456L, 789L)
subset_add_patients(output = output, r = r, patients = patients, subset_id = 3, language = "EN")
}
